      • receiveEnergy

        public int receiveEnergy(ForgeDirection from,
                int maxReceive,
                boolean simulate)
        Description copied from interface: IEnergyHandler
        Add energy to an IEnergyReceiver, internal distribution is left entirely to the IEnergyReceiver.
        Specified by:
        receiveEnergy in interface IEnergyHandler
        Specified by:
        receiveEnergy in interface IEnergyReceiver
        Parameters:
        from - Orientation the energy is received from.
        maxReceive - Maximum amount of energy to receive.
        simulate - If TRUE, the charge will only be simulated.
        Returns:
        Amount of energy that was (or would have been, if simulated) received.

      • extractEnergy

        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        extractEnergy in interface IEnergyProvider
        Parameters:
        from - Orientation the energy is extracted from.
        maxExtract - Maximum amount of energy to extract.
        simulate - If TRUE, the extraction will only be simulated.
        Returns:
        Amount of energy that was (or would have been, if simulated) extracted.
